WRITING.TITLE: i fully expect to get killed in my sleep for this.

WRITING.TEXT: bout the giant cupcake mold for my roommate for christmas.

i know, it sucks they don't :[ i can't tell you how many women i've had come in that need a bigger band size than a 38, or a really small band but huge cups, and we don't make those proportions. my manager actually can't fit into our bras because she wears a 36H (i think!) and has to get her bras custom-made.
